<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flying Blade](/Feats.aspx?ID=1515) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[precise strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks. When you have panache, you apply your precise strike damage on ranged Strikes you make with a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon within that weapon's first range increment. The thrown weapon must be an [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) or [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) weapon. This also allows you to make a thrown weapon ranged Strike for [Confident Finisher](/Actions.aspx?ID=550) and any other finisher that includes a Strike that can benefit from your precise strike.
name: Flying Blade
